message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $12,750. This is the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price for both of us.
